subject: feat: add PWA install/update UI with prompt-based service worker
body:
- Change registerType from 'autoUpdate' to 'prompt' so users control updates
- Add usePWAUpdate hook with 60-minute update polling and user-triggered refresh
- Add usePWAInstall hook with auto-install (Chromium) and manual instructions (Safari/Firefox)
- Add UpdatePrompt toast component for new version notifications
- Add InstallInstructionsModal with browser-specific install steps
- Add runtime caching rules for Google Fonts
- Add apple-mobile-web-app meta tags for iOS support
- Integrate install button and update prompt into App footer
